text: Lars Göran Ingemar Norén (9 May 1944 – 26 January 2021) was a Swedish playwright, novelist and poet.* His plays are realistic. He was born in Stockholm, Sweden. Norén was director at Folkteatern in Gothenburg between 2009 and 2011. Norén died on 26 January 2021, at the age of 76 from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Sweden. ==References== ==Other websites== *Art as an Underwater Bomb. title: Lars Norén
